H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H550.def: = man, also known as {L:Aminon<SDBH:אֲמִינֹון>}; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; ► raped his sister {L:Thamar<SDBH:תָּמָר>} and was killed by his brother {L:Absalom<SDBH:אַבְשָׁלֹום>}

H1841.def: = man; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; one of the family heads who accompanied {L:Ezra<SDBH:עֶזְרָא>} back to {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} after the exile; one of the signatories to the {L:covenant<SDBH:בְּרִית>} document of {L:Nehemiah<SDBH:נְחֶמְיָה>}

H26.def: = woman, also known as {L:Abigal<SDBH:אֲבִיגַל>}; ► wife of {L:Nabal<SDBH:נָבָל>}, who later married king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H1650.def: = kingdom; ◄ located between {L:Gilead<SDBH:גִּלְעָד>}, {L:Bashan<SDBH:בָּשָׁן>}, and {L:Mt. Hermon<SDBH:חֶרְמֹון>}; ► not conquered by Israelites ({A:ABD})

H6370.def: = a woman who lives with a man but has lower status than his wife or wives

H8559.def: = a type of palm tree, which reaches a height of 10-20 m and has a cluster of large leaves at the top; ◄ Phoenix dactylifera; ► it is cultivated for its edible sweet fruit, about the size of a human thumb, which grows in clusters; ≈ it is symbol of elegance and grace

H269.def: = daughter of one's father, whether from the same mother or not; ≈ sometimes associated with affection; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

H609.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Abijah<SDBH:אֲבִיָּה>}, who was also known as {L:Abijam<SDBH:אֲבִיָּם>}; ► king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; father of {L:Jehoshaphat<SDBH:יְהֹושָׁפָט>}

H274.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ahab<SDBH:אַחְאָב>}; ► king of northern kingdom of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3101.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; ► father of {L:Gideon<SDBH:גִּדְעֹון>}, judge of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H5838.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zadok<SDBH:צָדֹוק>}; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of king {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}

H3147.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Gideon<SDBH:גִּדְעֹון>}, the judge of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} who is also known as {L:Jerubbaal<SDBH:יְרֻבַּעַל>}; tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; ► known for the fable that he told about the inhabitants of {L:Shechem<SDBH:שְׁכֶם>}

H271.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jotham<SDBH:יֹותָם>}; ► king of southern kingdom of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H2396.def: = man, also known as {L:Jehizkiah<SDBH:יְחִזְקִיָּה>}; ◄ son of {L:Ahaz<SDBH:אָחָז>}; ► father of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H2216.def: = man; ► son of {L:Shealtiel<SDBH:שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל>} or, according to {S:01300301900000000} of {L:Pedaiah<SDBH:פְּדָיָה>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► governor of {L:Judea<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>} after the exile; according to {S:01300301900000000}, father of {L:Meshullam<SDBH:מְשֻׁלָּם>}, {L:Hananiah<SDBH:חֲנַנְיָה>}, and {L:Shelomith<SDBH:שְׁלֹמִית>}
